description:
AJMJ-09 EMBROIDERED NET 3 PCS

By Pcs: 3 Pcs Shirt: Net Trouser: Lawn Silk Dupatta: Net Color: Purple

Dive into the world of elegance with this magenta number from the “Jag Mag Collection”. This outfit is a gorgeous marvel meticulously adorned with architectural and floral motifs. The shirt is a canvas of artistry which boasts intricate embroidery that sparkles in the light. The gold zari, sequins, and light pink threadwork dance gracefully across the fabric creating a harmonious blend of tradition and contemporary style. The embroidered dupatta completes this radiant ensemble making you the center of every gaze.
DESIGN DETAILS:

Embroidered center panel on net

Embroidered side panels right & left on net

30'' embroidered border for front daman on net

30'' embroidered back with border on net

Pair of embroidered sleeves with border on net

2.5 meters embroidered border for front & back chaak on net

2.5 meters embroidered dupatta on net with 2 side borders

1.5 meters dyed wide-width lawn silk for trouser
